caption.p: T-cell responses of immunized mice. BALB/c mice ( n = 5) were immunized with recombinant vaccine candidates to measure the levels of virus/protein-specific T-cell responses by intracellular cytokine staining assay: ( A) IFNɤ-secreting CD4 + T-cell responses; ( B) TNFα-secreting CD8 + T-cell responses; ( C) TNFα-secreting CD4 + T-cell responses; ( D) IFNɤ-secreting CD8 + T-cell responses; ( E) TNFα-secreting effector memory CD4 + T-cell subsets (CD44 +CD62L −). Error bars represent mean ± SD. The T-cell levels were compared using two-way ANOVA followed by a Tukey’s multiple comparison test (* p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001; **** p < 0.0001).
